column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I believe that this is one of the best ramen places in Houston if not US. After living in Japan for a year
column2: I have struggled to find ramen places that pleases me. I can definitely say that compared to the other ramen shops that I tried Jinya is the only place with proper tonkotsu ramen. The pork and the egg almost melt in the mouth with the broth. I love to get their ramen with thicker noodle as I feel it has a better texture. The only downfall may be that the appetizers such as takoyaki and gzoya are not too great. But if you are here for ramen
column3: you cannot ask for anything better
